SEARCH
Package Controller.Request

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
Controller.Request.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
The AdminController class gives the power for Admin to do administrative jobs, such as adding and removing staff, editing staff information, assigning managers to branches, promoting staff to managers, transferring staff to other branches, adding payment methods, opening and closing branches, and displaying staff lists with filter and sort. It interacts with the data repository, Staff class and User class.
Author:
Reuben Farrel

  • Method Details

    • addStaff

      public static boolean addStaff(String name1, String loginID, Entity.User.EmployeeType role, String gender, String age, String branch, String password)
      This function adds a staff to a specific branch.
      Parameters:
      name1 - Employee's Name (String)
      loginID - Employee's ID (String)
      role - Employee's Role (enum EmployeeType), either EmployeeType.A (Admin), EmployeeType.M (Manager), or EmployeeType.S(Staff)
      gender - Employee's Gender (enum Gender), either Gender.M (Male) or Gender.F (Female)
      age - Employee's Age (String)
      branch - Empoyee's Branch (String)
      password - Employee's login Password (String), default is "password"
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if function a Staff member was successfully added to a branch, false otherwise.

    • editStaff

      public static void editStaff(String loginID, String newName, String newAge, String newGender, Entity.User.EmployeeType newRole, String newBranch)
      Edits the details of an existing staff member.
      Parameters:
      loginID - The login ID of the staff member to be edited.
      newName - The new name to assign to the staff member.
      newAge - The new age to assign to the staff member.
      newGender - The new gender to assign to the staff member.
      newRole - The new role to assign to the staff member.
      newBranch - The new branch to assign to the staff member.

    • removeStaff

      public static void removeStaff(String userId)
      Removes a staff member from the system.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the staff member to be removed.

    • assignManagerToBranch

      public static void assignManagerToBranch(String managerId, String branchName)
      This functions assigns a manager to a branch according to that branch's manager quota. A branch with 1-5 staff can have at most 1 manager. A branch with 5-8 staff can have at most 2 managers. A branch with 9-15 staff can have at most 3 managers.
      Parameters:
      managerId - User ID (String) of the manager to be assigned.
      branchName - Branch name (String) that the manager will be assigned to.

    • promoteStaffToManager

      public static boolean promoteStaffToManager(String staffId, String branchName, Entity.User.EmployeeType managerRole)
      Promotes a staff member to a branch manager.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The ID of the staff member to be promoted.
      branchName - The name of the branch to which the promoted manager will belong.
      managerRole - The role of the promoted manager.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member is successfully promoted, false otherwise.

    • transferUserToBranch

      public static void transferUserToBranch(String userId, String newBranchName, String currentBranchName)
      Transfers a user (staff member) to a different branch.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user (staff member) to be transferred.
      newBranchName - The name of the new branch to which the user will be transferred.
      currentBranchName - The name of the current branch from which the user will be transferred.

    • addPaymentMethod

      public static void addPaymentMethod(String paymentMethodName, String paymentClass) throws IOException
      Adds a new payment method to the FOMS system.
      Parameters:
      paymentMethodName - The name of the payment method to be added.
      paymentClass - The class representing the payment method implementation.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws IOException.

    • openBranch

      public static void openBranch(String branchName, String location, int quota) throws IOException
      Opens a new branch.
      Parameters:
      branchName - Name of the new branch (String).
      location - Location of the new branch (String).
      quota - Staff quota of the new branch (int).
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws IOException.

    • closeBranch

      public static void closeBranch(String branchName)
      Closes an existing branch.
      Parameters:
      branchName - The name of the branch to be closed.

    • displayStaffList

      public static void displayStaffList(int filterCriterion, String filterValue, boolean sortByAge)
      Displays a list of staff members based on specified filtering criteria.
      Parameters:
      filterCriterion - The criterion for filtering (1 for gender, 2 for branch, 3 for role).
      filterValue - The value to filter by.
      sortByAge - true if the list should be sorted by age, false otherwise.
